content: ch1 space single_crochet in next ch1 space half shell in next ch1 space ch1 shell in next ch2 space 6 times ch1 half shell in next ch1 space single_crochet in next ch1 space half shell in next ch1 space ch1 join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 7 shells 7 single_crochet 14 shells 14 ch1 sps round 8 ch1 single_crochet in same space as slip_stitch and in next 2 double_crochet single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next ch2 space *single_crochet in next 15 sts single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next ch2 space* repeat from * to * 6 times single_crochet in next 12 sts join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 119 single_crochet 7 ch2 sps round 9 ch1 single_crochet in same space as slip_stitch and in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next ch2 space *single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet sc3tog single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next ch2 space* repeat from * to * 6 times single_crochet in 7 single_crochet sc3tog single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 112 single_crochet 7 3sctog 7 ch2 sps fasten_off weave in ends with tapestry needle *page 2* blue ribbon round ripple dishcloth by julee a reeves finished size 10 across materials approx 2 ozs worsted weight cotton yarn h crochet hook tapestry needle a little bit of time special stitches popcorn double_crochet in indicated space 5 times take hook out of loop and insert into first double_crochet made then back into the dropped loop pull the loop through the first double_crochet shell 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in indicated space gauge first 3 rnds of pattern with popcorcn center = 3 this would also be a great starter for a round ripple afghan just continue in the same pattern for as big as you would like it to be *page 3* for a flat center round 1 ch5 double_crochet ch1 7 times in 5th chain from hk join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and in next ch1 space round 2 ch3 1 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in same space as slip_stitch shell in next ch1 space 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 8 shells continue on with round 4 below for a popcorn center round 1 ch2 8 single_crochet in second chain from hk join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 8 single_crochet round 2 ch3 double_crochet 4 times in same st as slip_stitch base of ch3 take hook out of loop and insert into first double_crochet made top of ch3 then back into the dropped loop pull the loop through the first double_crochet ch2 *popcorn in next single_crochet ch2* repeat from * to * 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next ch2 space 8 popcorn sts 8 ch2 sps round 3 ch3 1 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in same space as slip_stitch shell in next ch2 space 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg
